FORGE_CLEANER.ModuleDescription: File organization and optimization tool for Foundry VTT worlds.
FORGE_CLEANER.ApplyOrganization.Name: Apply Organization
FORGE_CLEANER.ApplyOrganization.Label: Run Organization Now
FORGE_CLEANER.ApplyOrganization.Hint: Click to organize all files according to your folder configuration.
FORGE_CLEANER.ApplyOrganization.BackupWa:
Have you backed up your world?

This operation will move files and modify your world data. It is strongly recommended to create a backup before proceeding.
FORGE_CLEANER.ApplyOrganization.ConfirmP: This will move files to organized folders and update all references. Continue?
FORGE_CLEANER.AssetsFolder.Name: Assets Folder Path
FORGE_CLEANER.AssetsFolder.Hint: Folder path for general assets (journal images, macro icons, etc.).
FORGE_CLEANER.NPCTokenFolder.Name: NPC Token Folder Path
FORGE_CLEANER.NPCTokenFolder.Hint: Folder path for NPC token images.
FORGE_CLEANER.PlayerTokenFolder.Name: Player Token Folder Path
FORGE_CLEANER.PlayerTokenFolder.Hint: Folder path for player character token images.
FORGE_CLEANER.ScenesFolder.Name: Scenes Folder Path
FORGE_CLEANER.ScenesFolder.Hint: Folder path for scene images and maps.
FORGE_CLEANER.RecreateAssetsFolders.Name: Recreate Assets Folder Structure
FORGE_CLEANER.RecreateAssetsFolders.Hint: If enabled, asset files (journals, macros) will be organized into subfolders matching the folder structure in Foundry.
FORGE_CLEANER.RecreateTokenFolders.Name: Recreate Token Folder Structure
FORGE_CLEANER.RecreateTokenFolders.Hint: If enabled, token files will be organized into subfolders matching the folder structure in Foundry.
FORGE_CLEANER.RecreateSceneFolders.Name: Recreate Scene Folder Structure
FORGE_CLEANER.RecreateSceneFolders.Hint: If enabled, scene files will be organized into subfolders matching the folder structure in Foundry.
FORGE_CLEANER.RecreateAudioFolders.Name: Recreate Audio Folder Structure
FORGE_CLEANER.RecreateAudioFolders.Hint: If enabled, audio files will be organized into subfolders matching the playlist folder structure in Foundry.
FORGE_CLEANER.RecreateItemsFolders.Name: Recreate Items Folder Structure
FORGE_CLEANER.RecreateItemsFolders.Hint: If enabled, item files will be organized into subfolders matching the folder structure in Foundry.
FORGE_CLEANER.AudioFolder.Name: Audio Folder Path
FORGE_CLEANER.AudioFolder.Hint: Folder path for audio files (playlist sounds, ambient sounds, etc.).
FORGE_CLEANER.ItemsFolder.Name: Items Folder Path
FORGE_CLEANER.OptimizeFiles.Name: Optimize Files
FORGE_CLEANER.OptimizeFiles.Label: Run Optimization
FORGE_CLEANER.OptimizeFiles.Hint: Convert files to optimized formats (webp for images) to reduce file size.
FORGE_CLEANER.OptimizeFiles.BackupWarnin:
Have you backed up your world?

This operation will convert files and may modify your world data. It is strongly recommended to create a backup before proceeding.
FORGE_CLEANER.OptimizeFiles.ConfirmPromp: This will convert files to optimized formats and may take a while. Continue?
FORGE_CLEANER.OptimizeFiles.Summary: Will optimize files in the following folders:
FORGE_CLEANER.OptimizeFiles.NotImplement: File optimization is not yet implemented.
FORGE_CLEANER.DebugLogging.Name: Enable Debug Logging
FORGE_CLEANER.DebugLogging.Hint: If enabled, Forge Cleaner will log detailed information to the browser console.
FORGE_CLEANER.Error.GMOnly: This feature is only available for Game Masters.
FORGE_CLEANER.Error.OrganizationFailed: Organization failed. Check the console for details.
